entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:25 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of thunderstorms this evening and after midnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
